def_cn: 溴化物，溴化钾（用作镇静剂）
def_en: Bromide is a drug which used to be given to people to calm their nerves when they were worried or upset.

def_cn: 老套的安慰话；陈词滥调
def_en: A bromide is a comment which is intended to calm someone down when they are angry, but which has been expressed so often that it has become boring and meaningless.
